page.title: 13HOME LIFE
page.content: We had{96}returns to our questionaire. There were some very interesting details about people who live in our area.{81}dads work full-time and{2} part-time. More mums work full-time than part-time, but we did count housewives as having a full-time occupation. Most people owned their own home and only{19}rented. When asked if they thought Dursley was a good shopping centre only{1}said "yes" and most did not think it adequate. People complain about bus services, but no men used them to go to work and only{2}women. Cars are the most popular form of transport. We thought it was very strange that the third most popular electrical item in the home was a computer.A television is in every home, but only{ {13 }homes have a dishwasher.
